titleNullable: NAVER  Webtoon Dataset with OSMU records
subtitleNullable: dataset crawled from NAVER  Webtoon(Korea) with its OSMU records
descriptionNullable:
This dataset was created as part of the final project for the 23-2 Machine Learning course (@Korea University).

The dataset compiles metadata from Naver webtoons that were either ongoing or completed at the time of its creation (September 2023). It labels each webtoon to indicate whether it has been utilized as an OSMU (One-Source Multi-Use).

Labeling criteria were based on references from Google searches and Namu Wiki, and were applied in the following cases of OSMU media adaptation:
- Webtoons adapted into movies, dramas, animations, plays, or games.
  - Note: Cases where dramas were adapted into webtoons or other reverse uses were excluded.
- Instances where webtoons were merely used for emoticons or merchandise, without significant adaptation into other media, were also excluded.
- Only those webtoons that had been fully adapted or announced as being adapted as of September 2023 were labeled. Webtoons with adaptations only scheduled for the future were not labeled.
